name: ace
description: ACE (Agentic Context Engineering) - CLI-based pattern learning. Direct ce-ace CLI integration via hooks. No MCP server, no subagents. Automatic per-task learning via PostToolUse hook. v5.1.1: Fix /ace-configure settings.json format bug. Requires ce-ace >= v1.0.4. Based on Stanford/SambaNova/UC Berkeley research (arXiv:2510.04618v1)
